name: Mankind Defender (Restocked)
description: Can you defend humanity from destruction? Are you ready for an unusual adventure? Get ready because we start soon...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1200 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 740 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1200 MB available space Sound Card: Yes xD
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
